name: Horde Battle Standard
tooltip:
Horde Battle Standard
Binds when picked up
Requires Centurion Knight-Champion
Use: Place a Battle Standard with 1500 health that increases the maximum health of all party members that stay within 45 yards of the Battle Standard by 15%.  Lasts 2 min. The Battle Standard may only be used in PvP Battlegrounds. (10 Min Cooldown)
Sell Price: 1 25
